    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lom.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oai</catalog>
            <entry>oai:aspect.cup.cam.ac.uk:cahi1:data_b20e8f8e0c499d4f20544eebb42edcee96a928ae</entry>
          </identifier>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>CUP</catalog>
            <entry>cahi1:data_b20e8f8e0c499d4f20544eebb42edcee96a928ae</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Cost effective energy loss reduction in buildings</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Kosteneffektive Energieverlustverringerung der 
Gebäude</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Réduction rentable de déperdition d'énergie des
bâtiments</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Redução eficaz da perda de energia do custo nos 
edifícios</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Riduzione redditizia di perdita di energia di 
costruzioni</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Οικονομικώς αποδοτική μείωση ενεργειακής απώλειας των
κτηρίων</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Reducción rentable de la pérdida de energía en 
edificios</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">Fifth of five illustrations showing several ways to lessen heat losses in buildings. The figure shows a part of a double glazed window that can save as much as half of heat lost in uninsulated windows.</string>
          </description>
          <language>x-none</language>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">double glazing</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">pay-back time</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">thermal energy losses</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <source>structureValues</source>
            <value>atomic</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Fünftel von fünf Abbildungen, die einige 
Methoden zeigen, die Wärmeverlust in den Gebäuden zu vermindern. 
Die Abbildung zeigt ein Teil eines doppelten glasig-glänzenden 
Fensters, das soviel wie die Hälfte der Hitze sichern kann verloren 
in nicht isolierten Fenstern.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Cinquième de cinq illustrations montrant 
plusieurs voies de diminuer des pertes de chaleur dans les bâtiments.
La figure montre une partie d'une double fenêtre glacée qui 
peut sauvegarder autant que la moitié de la chaleur détruite dans 
les fenêtres non isolées.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Fifth de cinco ilustrações que mostram diversas 
maneiras diminuir perdas de calor nos edifícios. A figura 
mostra uma parte de uma janela vitrificada dobro que possa conservar 
tanto quanto a metade do calor perdida em janelas uninsulated.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Un fifth di cinque illustrazioni che mostrano 
parecchi modi diminuire le perdite di calore in costruzioni. La 
figura mostra una parte di doppia finestra lustrata che può salvare 
tanto quanto la metà di calore persa in finestre non isolate.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Πέμπτη πέντε απεικονίσεων που εμφανίζουν διάφορους 
τρόπους να ελαττωθούν οι απώλειες θερμότητας στα κτήρια. Ο 
αριθμός εμφανίζει ένα μέρος ενός διπλού βερνικωμένου παραθύρου
που μπορεί να σώσει τόσο όσο και τη μισή από τη θερμότητα που 
χάνεται στα uninsulated Windows.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Fifth de cinco ilustraciones que muestran varias 
maneras de aminorar pérdidas de calor en edificios. La figura 
muestra una parte de una ventana esmaltada doble que pueda salvar 
tanto como la mitad del calor perdida en ventanas sin aislar.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Doppelverglasung</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Rückzahlungzeit</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">thermische Energieverluste</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">double vitrage</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">temps de remboursement</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">déperditions d'énergie thermiques</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">vitrificar dobro</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">tempo do pay-back</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">perdas de energia térmicas</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">vetratura doppia</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">tempo di rimborso</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">perdite di energia termiche</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">διπλή τοποθέτηση υαλοπινάκων</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">χρόνος επιστροφής</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">θερμικές ενεργειακές απώλειες</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">doble vidriera</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">tiempo del reembolso</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">pérdidas de energía termales</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
